1.title: National Pride
1.plot: Sixeen fighters from AUS and UK enter the Ultimate Fighter house for 6 weeks of intense training under coaches George Sotiropoulos (Aus) and Ross Pearson (UK). UFC President Dana White fires them up, and the first 2 welterweights step inside The Octagon.

2.title: Freak or Unique
2.plot: UFC Heavyweight Champ Junior Dos Santos drops in to surprise fighters and offer advice. The UFC makes a decision on injured Pastou's future, and Team UK finds hate in Ben Wall. The Australian's hold the power and select the 1st Lightweight bout.

3.title: Wasabi
3.plot: The fighters are starting to get restless in the house so Freakshow and Ben Wall tackle a Wasabi challenge to ease boredom. Both teams are confident in their Welterweights, so the coaches engage in mind games seeking to get the edge in the third fight.

4.title: Pick Me!
4.plot: This week sees both coaches up the intensity in training; with George giving the Team AUS conditioning work in the sand dunes, & Ross taking Team UK through the training session from hell. Team UK try to pressure George with a "pick me, pick me" chant.

5.title: Fight For Your Family
5.plot: Team UK celebrates their previous win with a night of wild antics, leaving the Aussies unable to sleep and unimpressed. One fighter tells Ross he wants to go home, throwing Team UK into a spin. Then two family men face off in the next Welterweight fight.

6.title: True Warrior
6.plot: With the Australian's in control, George must choose between his two remaining lightweights, but when the pressure gets to one in training, it becomes a difficult choice. One fighter's future is left shattered and Dana is brought in to decide his fate.

7.title: Unwise Words
7.plot: The UK team takes mischief to a whole new level with an all out food fight. Manny's replacement Vainikolo settles in and gets ready to fight. Light Heavyweight James Te Huna pays Team AUS a visit and the discovery of a diary tears one team apart.

8.title: Phone Home
8.plot: A scandal shocks Dana White, forcing him to summon all of the fighters, and it leaves a team on the edge of destruction. Tensions fire up when Team UK lose their training diary and the final 2 lightweights go toe to toe for a place in the semi finals.

9.title: Easy Route
9.plot: With the upcoming semi-finals both teams up the intensity in training: causing tension and an injury. Loyalties are tested and one fighter's pride is destroyed when Dana White asks each fighter who they consider the easiest route to the final.

10.title: Smash It Up
10.plot: The coaches smash it up in an insane coaches challenge that gets the adrenaline pumping. Then it's mate vs mate in the first Semi Final as Parke takes on fellow Brit Loughnane for a chance in the finale and to become The Ultimate Fighter.

12.title: Little and Large
12.plot: After stunning fights, training, volatile emotions and games, it all comes down to a David and Goliath battle with the UK's 'Freakshow' Fletcher and Australia's last hope, Richie Vaculik. Who will claim the final spot against Norman Parke in the finale?

imdb.plot outline: Sixteen fighters from Australia and UK enter the Ultimate Fighter house for 6 weeks of intense training. 8 Lightweight and 8 Welterweight fighters will face each other both for themselves and their country under coaches George Sotiropoulos (Aus) and Ross Pearson (UK).
imdb.title: The Ultimate Fighter Australia
plot: Sixteen fighters from Australia and UK enter the Ultimate Fighter house for 6 weeks of intense training. 8 Lightweight and 8 Welterweight fighters will face each other both for themselves and their country under coaches George Sotiropoulos (Aus) and Ross Pearson (UK).
